reviews.review_msg: His lectures are very disorganized and hard to follow. Writes everything on the board and has very little to do with the material on the exam. He seems to know what he is talking about but does not give enough information on the readings in lecture. I would avoid taking another class with him

Super disorganized. Never post anything online which sucks cuz he writes everything on the board. He mumbles to himself and is not very clear on the material. Posted the final exam review guide a couple days before the actual exam. Will definitely avoid taking his class from now on. Good luck my friends.
